syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
    "diffEditor.renderSideBySide": false,
    "editor.fontFamily": "\"JetBrainsMono NFP\", monospace",
    "editor.inlayHints.fontFamily": "\"JetBrainsMono NFP\", monospace",
    "editor.fontSize": 16,
    "editor.inlayHints.enabled": "on",
    "editor.lightbulb.enabled": "off",
    "editor.cursorBlinking": "smooth",
    "editor.unicodeHighlight.allowedLocales": {
        "ru": true
    },
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "isort.args": [
        "--profile",
        "black"
    ],
    "files.exclude": {
        "**/__pycache__": true,
        "**/.git/objects/**": true,
        "**/tmp/**": true
    },
    "window.enableMenuBarMnemonics": false,
    "python.analysis.inlayHints.functionReturnTypes": true,
    "git.timeline.showAuthor": false,
    "git.confirmSync": false,
    "window.customMenuBarAltFocus": false,
    "window.titleBarStyle": "custom",
    "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.windows": "Git Bash",
    "git.autofetch": true,
    "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
    "python.analysis.autoImportCompletions": true,
    "testing.showAllMessages": true,
    "html.format.templating": true,
    "debug.openExplorerOnEnd": true,
    "terminal.integrated.inheritEnv": false,
    "remote.SSH.remoteServerListenOnSocket": true,
    "python.terminal.activateEnvironment": false,
    "python.analysis.inlayHints.callArgumentNames": "partial",
    "python.analysis.typeCheckingMode": "off",
    "todo-tree.filtering.excludeGlobs": [
        "**/node_modules/*/**",
        "**/.venv/*/**"
    ],
    "javascript.preferGoToSourceDefinition": true,
    "workbench.settings.applyToAllProfiles": [
        "python.analysis.diagnosticMode"
    ],
    "[python]": {
        "diffEditor.ignoreTrimWhitespace": false,
        "editor.formatOnSave": true,
        "editor.wordBasedSuggestions": "off",
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-python.black-formatter",
        "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
            "source.organizeImports": "explicit",
            "source.unusedImports": "always"
        },
    },
    "files.watcherExclude": {
        "**/dist/**": true,
        "**/tmp/**": true
    },
    "search.exclude": {
        "**/.git/objects/**": true,
        "**/.git/subtree-cache/**": true,
        "**/dist/**": true,
        "**/node_modules/**": true,
        "**/tmp/**": true
    },
    "extensions.autoCheckUpdates": false,
    "extensions.autoUpdate": false,
    "python.languageServer": "Pylance",
    "python.missingPackage.severity": "Warning",
    "update.mode": "none",
    "python.analysis.diagnosticMode": "openFilesOnly",
    "python.analysis.userFileIndexingLimit": 100,
    "python.analysis.ignore": [
        ".venv"
    ],
    "gitlens.hovers.currentLine.over": "line",
    "gitlens.codeLens.scopes": [
        "document",
        "containers",
        "blocks"
    ],
    "gitlens.views.contributors.showStatistics": true,
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Default Dark+",
    "settingsSync.ignoredSettings": [
        "-window.zoomLevel"
    ],
    "editor.formatOnSave": true,
    "extensions.experimental.affinity": {
        "asvetliakov.vscode-neovim": 1
    },
    "window.zoomLevel": 1.5
}"}
